verses.verse: <S%H7971>Cast<s%> thy <S%H3899>bread<s%> <S%H6440>upon<s%> the <S%H4325>waters<s%>: for thou shalt <S%H4672>find<s%> it after <S%H7230>many<s%> <S%H3117>days<s%>.
<S%H5414>Give<s%> a <S%H2506>portion<s%> to <S%H7651>seven<s%>, and also to <S%H8083>eight<s%>; for thou <S%H3045>knowest<s%> not what <S%H7451>evil<s%> shall be upon the <S%H776>earth<s%>.

If the <S%H5645>clouds<s%> be <S%H4390>full<s%> of <S%H1653>rain<s%>, they <S%H7324>empty<s%> themselves upon the <S%H776>earth<s%>: and if the <S%H6086>tree<s%> <S%H5307>fall<s%> toward the <S%H1864>south<s%>, or toward the <S%H6828>north<s%>, in the <S%H4725>place<s%> where the <S%H6086>tree<s%> <S%H5307>falleth<s%>, there it shall <S%H1933>be<s%>.
He that <S%H8104>observeth<s%> the <S%H7307>wind<s%> shall not <S%H2232>sow<s%>; and he that <S%H7200>regardeth<s%> the <S%H5645>clouds<s%> shall not <S%H7114>reap<s%>.

As thou <S%H3045>knowest<s%> not what is the <S%H1870>way<s%> of the <S%H7307>spirit<s%>, nor how the <S%H6106>bones<s%> do grow in the <S%H990>womb<s%> of her that is with <S%H4392>child<s%>: even so thou <S%H3045>knowest<s%> not the <S%H4639>works<s%> of <S%H430>God<s%> who <S%H6213>maketh<s%> all.

In the <S%H1242>morning<s%> <S%H2232>sow<s%> thy <S%H2233>seed<s%>, and in the <S%H6153>evening<s%> <S%H3240>withhold<s%> not thine <S%H3027>hand<s%>: for thou <S%H3045>knowest<s%> not <S%H335>whether<s%> shall <S%H3787>prosper<s%>, either this or that, or whether they <S%H8147>both<s%> shall be <S%H259>alike<s%> <S%H2896>good<s%>.
¶ Truly the <S%H216>light<s%> is <S%H4966>sweet<s%>, and a <S%H2896>pleasant<s%> thing it is for the <S%H5869>eyes<s%> to <S%H7200>behold<s%> the <S%H8121>sun<s%>:

But if a <S%H120>man<s%> <S%H2421>live<s%> <S%H7235>many<s%> <S%H8141>years<s%>, and <S%H8055>rejoice<s%> in them all; yet let him <S%H2142>remember<s%> the <S%H3117>days<s%> of <S%H2822>darkness<s%>; for they shall be <S%H7235>many<s%>. All that <S%H935>cometh<s%> is <S%H1892>vanity<s%>.

¶ <S%H8055>Rejoice<s%>, O young <S%H970>man<s%>, in thy <S%H3208>youth<s%>; and let thy <S%H3820>heart<s%> <S%H2895>cheer<s%> thee in the <S%H3117>days<s%> of thy <S%H979>youth<s%>, and <S%H1980>walk<s%> in the <S%H1870>ways<s%> of thine <S%H3820>heart<s%>, and in the <S%H4758>sight<s%> of thine <S%H5869>eyes<s%>: but <S%H3045>know<s%> thou, that for all these things <S%H430>God<s%> will <S%H935>bring<s%> thee into <S%H4941>judgment<s%>.

Therefore <S%H5493>remove<s%> <S%H3708>sorrow<s%> from thy <S%H3820>heart<s%>, and put <S%H5674>away<s%> <S%H7451>evil<s%> from thy <S%H1320>flesh<s%>: for <S%H3208>childhood<s%> and <S%H7839>youth<s%> are <S%H1892>vanity<s%>.
